title: What have been some of the greatest accomplishments for engineers in history? - Quora

response.answer_text: The manned moon landing in 1969 has probably no match. But there are few other honourable mentions:- The ISS space station- The CERN in Geneva- The Channel Tunnel Also one of the greatest of all time was the construction of the pyramids in the ancient Egypt. There are still some doubt about the methods they’ve used….

first thought is the Wheel, it still makes things go around today. on the surface it is such a simple concept, but some one had to come up with it, and ofcource, there is the shaft that makes it so very useful. The chinese invention of what we know today as gun powder is another invention that has made life better, and worse. But even before that, the method of starting and maintaining a fire moved humans into a new age.
